message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this excellent product. Given its features and value, I'm initially proposing a price of $15,000.  What are your thoughts?
I appreciate your initial offer, but I'm looking to save some money on this purchase. I'm willing to pay $12,500 for the product. Can you consider this offer?
Thanks for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your position, but the product's value is quite high.  I could meet you halfway between our offers. How about $13,750?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $13,000 for the product. Can you consider this offer?
